channel.title: Simba on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Simba on Simba Tango

item.title: Moving
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Here is a short meta update. The time for moving has come, both physically and technologywise. In a few months I will be moving back to my hometown, which happens to have a vibrant tango community. Looking forward to that. I do have some ideas for posts, but what little time I have for tango at the moment is spent actually dancing and djing. Also, this blog has moved, for a variety of reasons.

item.title: Tango @ Times Square

item.description: Above: Simba @ Times Square Below: Los Hermanos Macana @ Times Square

item.title: DÃ­a del padre/Father's Day
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Look what Simba got for Father’s Day! Guess which is now the favourite book for the night-time reading? Even beats That’s not my Dinosaur. The daddy frog and the froglet seems to be my son’s favourite part of this book, though. The book is by Anne Gutman and Georg Hallensleben, published by chronicle books.
